00093   double dist_sq_to_quad_box(const Point &q, const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00094   {
00095     unsigned int j;
00096     int i;
00097     CType x,y;
00098     double z;
00099     z=0;
00100     x=0;
00101     for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00102       {
00103         y = (CType) (p1[j]^p2[j]);
00104         if(less_msb(x, y)) 
00105           {
00106             x = y;
00107           }
00108       }
00109     frexp((float)x, &i);
00110     for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00111       {
00112         x = (CType) ((((p1)[j])>>i)<<i);
00113         y = (CType) ((int) x+(1 << i));
00114         if(q[j] < x) 
00115           z+= pow(((double) q[j]-(double) x), 2.0);
00116         else if(q[j] > y) 
00117           z+= pow(((double) q[j]-(double) y), 2.0);
00118       }
00119     return z;
00120   }
00121   
00128   double quad_box_length(const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00129   {
00130     unsigned int j;
00131     int i;
00132     CType x,y;
00133     double length;
00134 
00135     x = 0;
00136     if(p1 == p2)
00137       return 0;
00138     for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00139       {
00140         if((p1[j] < 0) != (p2[j] < 0))
00141           {
00142             return 0;
00143           }
00144         y = p1[j]^p2[j];
00145         if(less_msb(x,y)) x=y;
00146       }
00147     length = pow((CType) 2.0,x);
00148     return length;
00149   };
00157   void min_quad_box(const Point &p1, const Point &p2, Point &lcorner, Point &ucorner)
00158   {
00159     double length = quad_box_length(p1, p2);
00160     if(length==0)
00161       {
00162         lcorner=p1;
00163         ucorner=p1;
00164         return;
00165       }
00166     else if(length == (std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)())
00167       {
00168         for(unsigned int j=0;j <  Point::__DIM;++j)
00169           {
00170             lcorner[j] = -(std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00171             ucorner[j] = (std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00172           }
00173       }
00174     else 
00175       for(unsigned int j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00176         {
00177           lcorner[j]  = floor(p1[j] / length) * length;
00178           ucorner[j]  = lcorner[j]+length;
00179         }
00180   }  
00195   void dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(const Point &q1, const Point &q2, const Point &p1, const Point &p2, double &dist, double &radius1, double &radius2)
00196   {
00197     unsigned int j;
00198     int x,y;
00199     double box_edge_q1, box_edge_q2;
00200     double box_edge_p1, box_edge_p2;
00201     double z;
00202     double box_dist1, box_dist2;
00203 
00204     z = 0;
00205 
00206     radius1 = quad_box_length(q1, q2);
00207     
00208     radius2 = quad_box_length(p1, p2);
00209 
00210     dist = 0;
00211 
00212     if((radius1 == 0) && (radius2 == 0))
00213       {
00214         dist = p1.sqr_dist(q2);
00215       }
00216     else if(radius1 == 0)
00217       {
00218         for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00219           {
00220             box_edge_p1 = floor(p1[j] / radius2) * radius2;
00221             box_edge_p2 = box_edge_p1+radius2;
00222             
00223             if(q1[j] < box_edge_p1) 
00224               dist+=(q1[j]-box_edge_p1)*(q1[j]-box_edge_p1);
00225             else if(q1[j] > box_edge_p2) 
00226               dist+= (q1[j]-box_edge_p2)*(q1[j]-box_edge_p2);
00227           }
00228       }
00229     else if(radius2 == 0)
00230       {
00231         for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00232           {
00233             box_edge_q1 = floor(q1[j] / radius1) * radius1;
00234             box_edge_q2 = box_edge_q1+radius1;
00235             
00236             if(p1[j] < box_edge_q1) 
00237               dist+=(p1[j]-box_edge_q1)*(p1[j]-box_edge_q1);
00238             else if(p1[j] > box_edge_q2) 
00239               dist+= (p1[j]-box_edge_q2)*(p1[j]-box_edge_q2);
00240           }
00241       }
00242     else
00243       {
00244         for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00245           {
00246             box_edge_q1 = floor(q1[j] / radius1) * radius1;
00247             box_edge_q2 = box_edge_q1+radius1;
00248             box_edge_p1 = floor(p1[j] / radius2) * radius2;
00249             box_edge_p2 = box_edge_p1+radius2;
00250             
00251             if(box_edge_q2 < box_edge_p1)
00252               z+=(box_edge_p1-box_edge_q2)*(box_edge_p1-box_edge_q2);
00253             else if (box_edge_p2 < box_edge_q1)
00254               z+=(box_edge_q1-box_edge_p2)*(box_edge_q1-box_edge_p2);
00255           }
00256         dist=z;
00257       }
00258     return;
00259   }

00261   CType offset;
00262   bool lt_func(const Point &p, const Point &q)
00263   {
00264     CType x,y;
00265     int k;
00266     int j;
00267     x=0;
00268     for(j=k=0;k < (int) Point::__DIM;++k)
00269       {
00270         y = (CType) ((p[k]+offset)^(q[k]+offset));
00271         if(less_msb(x,y))
00272           {
00273             j=k;
00274             x=y;
00275           }
00276       }
00277     return p[j] < q[j];
00278   }

00280   bool less_msb(CType x, CType y)
00281   {
00282     return (x < y) && (x < (x^y));
00283   }

00342   double dist_sq_to_quad_box(const Point &q, const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00343   {
00344     unsigned int j;
00345     int i;
00346     CType x,y;
00347     double z, X, Y;
00348     
00349     x = (std::numeric_limits<CType>::min)();
00350     for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00351       {
00352         if((p1[j] < 0) != (p2[j] < 0))
00353           {
00354             return 0;
00355           }
00356         y = (CType) (p1[j]^p2[j]);
00357         if(less_msb(x,y)) x = y;
00358       }
00359     frexp((double)x, &i);
00360     for(z=j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00361       {
00362         X = (double) ((p1[j]>>i)<<i);
00363         Y = (double) (1 << i);
00364         Y = Y+X;
00365         if(q[j] < X) 
00366           z+=pow(((double) X - (double) q[j]), 2.0);
00367         else if(q[j] > Y) 
00368           z+=pow(((double) q[j] - (double) Y), 2.0);
00369       }
00370     return z;
00371   }
00378   double quad_box_length(const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00379   {
00380     unsigned int j;
00381     int i;
00382     CType x,y;
00383 
00384     x = -(std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00385     if(p1 == p2)
00386       return 0;
00387     for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00388       {
00389         if((p1[j] < 0) != (p2[j] < 0))
00390           {
00391             return 0;
00392           }
00393         y = p1[j]^p2[j];
00394         if(less_msb(x,y)) x=y;
00395       }
00396     x = pow((CType) 2.0,x);
00397     return x;
00398   };

00510   CType offset;
00511   bool lt_func(const Point &p, const Point &q)
00512   {
00513     CType x,y;
00514     int j=0;
00515     unsigned int k;
00516     x = (CType) (-(std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)());
00517     for(k=0;k < Point::__DIM;++k)
00518       {
00519         if(((p[k]+offset) < 0) != ((q[k]+offset) < 0))
00520           return (p[k]+offset) < (q[k]+offset);
00521         y = (CType) ((p[k]+offset)^(q[k]+offset));
00522         if(less_msb(x,y))
00523           {
00524             j=k;
00525             x=y;
00526           }
00527       }
00528     return p[j] < q[j];
00529   }

00533     return (x < y) && (x < (x^y));

00538 //Z Order spec for floating point types
00547 template<typename Point, typename CType>
00548 class zorder_lt_worker <Point, CType, zorder_t, zorder_f, zorder_f>
00549 {
00550 public: 
00555   zorder_lt_worker()
00556   {
00557     offset=0;
00558   }
00562   ~zorder_lt_worker(){;}
00563   void set_offset(CType off)
00564   {
00565     offset = off;
00566   }
00576   bool operator()(const Point &p, const Point &q)
00577   {
00578     return lt_func(p,q);
00579   }
00586   double quad_box_length(const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00587   {
00588     sep_float<CType> p1c, p2c;
00589     CType x,y;
00590     
00591     x = -(std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00592     if(p1 == p2)
00593       return 0;
00594     for(unsigned int j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00595       {
00596         if((p1[j] < 0) != (p2[j] < 0))
00597           {
00598             return (double) (std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00599           }
00600         p1c = p1[j];
00601         p2c = p2[j];
00602         y = msdb(p1c, p2c);
00603         if(y > x)
00604           {
00605             x = y;
00606           }
00607       }
00608     x = pow((CType) 2.0,x);
00609     return x;
00610   };
00618   void min_quad_box(const Point &p1, const Point &p2, Point &lcorner, Point &ucorner)
00619   {
00620     CType length = (CType) quad_box_length(p1, p2);
00621     if(length==0)
00622       {
00623         lcorner=p1;
00624         ucorner=p1;
00625         return;
00626       }
00627     else if(length == (std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)())
00628       {
00629         for(unsigned int j=0;j <  Point::__DIM;++j)
00630           {
00631             lcorner[j] = -(std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00632             ucorner[j] = (std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00633           }
00634       }
00635     else 
00636       for(unsigned int j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00637         {
00638           lcorner[j]  = floor(p1[j] / length) * length;
00639           ucorner[j]  = lcorner[j]+length;
00640         }
00641   }
00655   double dist_sq_to_quad_box(const Point &q, const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00656   {
00657     unsigned int j;
00658     int x,y;
00659     double box_edge_1, box_edge_2;
00660     double z;
00661     CType box_dist;
00662     sep_float<CType> p1c, p2c;
00663     z = 0;
00664     x = -(std::numeric_limits<int>::max)();
00665     
00666     for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00667       {
00668         if((p1[j] < 0) != (p2[j] < 0))
00669           return 0;
00670         p1c = p1[j];
00671         p2c = p2[j];
00672         y = msdb(p1c, p2c);
00673         if(y > x)
00674           {
00675             x = y;
00676           }
00677       }
00678     box_dist = pow(2.0,x);
00679     for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00680       {
00681         box_edge_1 = floor(p1[j] / box_dist) * box_dist;
00682         box_edge_2 = box_edge_1+box_dist;
00683         
00684         if(q[j] < box_edge_1) 
00685           z+=(q[j]-box_edge_1)*(q[j]-box_edge_1);
00686         else if(q[j] > box_edge_2) 
00687           z+= (q[j]-box_edge_2)*(q[j]-box_edge_2);
00688       }
00689     return z;
00690   }
00705   void dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(const Point &q1, const Point &q2, const Point &p1, const Point &p2, double &dist, double &radius1, double &radius2)
00706   {
00707     unsigned int j;
00708     int x,y;
00709     double box_edge_q1, box_edge_q2;
00710     double box_edge_p1, box_edge_p2;
00711     double z;
00712     CType box_dist1, box_dist2;
00713     sep_float<CType> p1c, p2c, q1c, q2c;
00714 
00715     z = 0;
00716 
00717     radius1 = quad_box_length(q1, q2);
00718     
00719     radius2 = quad_box_length(p1, p2);
00720     dist = 0;
00721 
00722     if((radius1 == 0) && (radius2 == 0))
00723       {
00724         dist = p1.sqr_dist(q2);
00725       }
00726     else if(radius1 == 0)
00727       {
00728         for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00729           {
00730             box_edge_p1 = floor(p1[j] / radius2) * radius2;
00731             box_edge_p2 = box_edge_p1+radius2;
00732             
00733             if(q1[j] < box_edge_p1) 
00734               dist+=(q1[j]-box_edge_p1)*(q1[j]-box_edge_p1);
00735             else if(q1[j] > box_edge_p2) 
00736               dist+= (q1[j]-box_edge_p2)*(q1[j]-box_edge_p2);
00737           }
00738       }
00739     else if(radius2 == 0)
00740       {
00741         for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00742           {
00743             box_edge_q1 = floor(q1[j] / radius1) * radius1;
00744             box_edge_q2 = box_edge_q1+radius1;
00745             
00746             if(p1[j] < box_edge_q1) 
00747               dist+=(p1[j]-box_edge_q1)*(p1[j]-box_edge_q1);
00748             else if(p1[j] > box_edge_q2) 
00749               dist+= (p1[j]-box_edge_q2)*(p1[j]-box_edge_q2);
00750           }
00751       }
00752     else
00753       {
00754         for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00755           {
00756             box_edge_q1 = floor(q1[j] / radius1) * radius1;
00757             box_edge_q2 = box_edge_q1+radius1;
00758             box_edge_p1 = floor(p1[j] / radius2) * radius2;
00759             box_edge_p2 = box_edge_p1+radius2;
00760             
00761             if(box_edge_q2 < box_edge_p1)
00762               z+=(box_edge_p1-box_edge_q2)*(box_edge_p1-box_edge_q2);
00763             else if (box_edge_p2 < box_edge_q1)
00764               z+=(box_edge_q1-box_edge_p2)*(box_edge_q1-box_edge_p2);
00765           }
00766         dist=z;
00767       }
00768     return;
00769   }
00770 private:
00771   bool lt_func(const Point &p, const Point &q)
00772   {
00773     int y,x;
00774     unsigned int k,j;
00775     sep_float<CType> pc, qc;
00776     j = 0;
00777     x = -(std::numeric_limits<int>::max)();
00778     for(k=0;k < Point::__DIM;++k)
00779       {
00780         if((p[k] < 0) != (q[k] < 0))
00781           return p[k] < q[k];
00782         pc = p[k]+offset;
00783         qc = q[k]+offset;
00784         y = msdb(pc, qc);
00785         if(x < y)
00786           {
00787             j = k;
00788             x = y;
00789           }
00790       }
00791     return p[j] < q[j];
00792   }
00793   CType offset;
00794 };
00795 
00796 //Z Order spec for seperated floating point types
00807 template<typename Point, typename CType>
00808 class zorder_lt_worker <Point, CType, zorder_t, zorder_f, zorder_t>
00809 {
00810 public: 
00815   zorder_lt_worker()
00816   {
00817     offset=0;
00818   }
00822   ~zorder_lt_worker(){;}
00823   void set_offset(CType off)
00824   {
00825     offset=off;
00826   }
00836   bool operator()(const Point &p, const Point &q)
00837   {
00838     return lt_func(p,q);
00839   }
00853   double dist_sq_to_quad_box(const Point &q, const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00854   {
00855     unsigned int j;
00856     int x,y;
00857     double box_edge_1, box_edge_2;
00858     double z;
00859     typename CType::flt_type box_dist;
00860 
00861     z = 0;
00862     x = -(std::numeric_limits<int>::max)();
00863     for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00864       {
00865         if((p1[j].get_flt() < 0) != (p2[j].get_flt() < 0))
00866           return 0;
00867         y = msdb(p1[j], p2[j]);
00868         if(y > x)
00869           {
00870             x = y;
00871           }
00872       }
00873     box_dist = (typename CType::flt_type) pow((typename CType::flt_type) 2.0,x);
00874     for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00875       {
00876         box_edge_1 = floor(p1[j] / box_dist) * box_dist;
00877         box_edge_2 = box_edge_1+box_dist;
00878         
00879         if(q[j].get_flt() < box_edge_1) 
00880           z+=(q[j].get_flt()-box_edge_1)*(q[j].get_flt()-box_edge_1);
00881         else if(q[j].get_flt() > box_edge_2) 
00882           z+= (q[j].get_flt()-box_edge_2)*(q[j].get_flt()-box_edge_2);
00883       }
00884     return z;
00885   }
00892   double quad_box_length(const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00893   {
00894     double x,y;
00895     
00896     x = -(std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
00897     if(p1 == p2)
00898       return 0;
00899     for(unsigned int j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00900       {
00901         if((p1[j].get_flt() < 0) != (p2[j].get_flt < 0))
00902           {
00903             return (double) (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
00904           }
00905         y = msdb(p1[j], p2[j]);
00906         if(y > x)
00907           {
00908             x = y;
00909           }
00910       }
00911     x = pow(2.0,x);
00912     return x;
00913   };
00921   void min_quad_box(const Point &p1, const Point &p2, Point &lcorner, Point &ucorner)
00922   {
00923     double length = quad_box_length(p1, p2);
00924     if(length==0)
00925       {
00926         lcorner=p1;
00927         ucorner=p1;
00928         return;
00929       }
00930     else if(length == (std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)())
00931       {
00932         for(unsigned int j=0;j <  Point::__DIM;++j)
00933           {
00934             lcorner[j] = -(std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00935             ucorner[j] = (std::numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00936           }
00937       }
00938     else 
00939       for(unsigned int j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00940         {
00941           lcorner[j]  = floor(p1[j] / length) * length;
00942           ucorner[j]  = lcorner[j]+length;
00943         }
00944   }
00959   void dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(const Point &q1, const Point &q2, const Point &p1, const Point &p2, double &dist, double &radius1, double &radius2)
00960   {
00961     unsigned int j;
00962     int x,y;
00963     double box_edge_q1, box_edge_q2;
00964     double box_edge_p1, box_edge_p2;
00965     double z;
00966     double box_dist1, box_dist2;
00967 
00968     z = 0;
00969 
00970     radius1 = quad_box_length(q1, q2);
00971     
00972     radius2 = quad_box_length(p1, p2);
00973 
00974     dist = 0;
00975 
00976     if((radius1 == 0) && (radius2 == 0))
00977       {
00978         dist = p1.sqr_dist(q2);
00979       }
00980     else if(radius1 == 0)
00981       {
00982         for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00983           {
00984             box_edge_p1 = floor(p1[j] / radius2) * radius2;
00985             box_edge_p2 = box_edge_p1+radius2;
00986             
00987             if(q1[j] < box_edge_p1) 
00988               dist+=(q1[j]-box_edge_p1)*(q1[j]-box_edge_p1);
00989             else if(q1[j] > box_edge_p2) 
00990               dist+= (q1[j]-box_edge_p2)*(q1[j]-box_edge_p2);
00991           }
00992       }
00993     else if(radius2 == 0)
00994       {
00995         for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00996           {
00997             box_edge_q1 = floor(q1[j] / radius1) * radius1;
00998             box_edge_q2 = box_edge_q1+radius1;
00999             
01000             if(p1[j] < box_edge_q1) 
01001               dist+=(p1[j]-box_edge_q1)*(p1[j]-box_edge_q1);
01002             else if(p1[j] > box_edge_q2) 
01003               dist+= (p1[j]-box_edge_q2)*(p1[j]-box_edge_q2);
01004           }
01005       }
01006     else
01007       {
01008         for(j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
01009           {
01010             box_edge_q1 = floor(q1[j] / radius1) * radius1;
01011             box_edge_q2 = box_edge_q1+radius1;
01012             box_edge_p1 = floor(p1[j] / radius2) * radius2;
01013             box_edge_p2 = box_edge_p1+radius2;
01014             
01015             if(box_edge_q2 < box_edge_p1)
01016               z+=(box_edge_p1-box_edge_q2)*(box_edge_p1-box_edge_q2);
01017             else if (box_edge_p2 < box_edge_q1)
01018               z+=(box_edge_q1-box_edge_p2)*(box_edge_q1-box_edge_p2);
01019           }
01020         dist=z;
01021       }
01022     return;
01023   }
01024 private:
01025   bool lt_func(const Point &p, const Point &q)
01026   {
01027     int y,x;
01028     unsigned int k,j;
01029     j = 0;
01030     x = -(std::numeric_limits<int>::max)();
01031     for(k=0;k < Point::__DIM;++k)
01032       {
01033         if((p[k].get_flt() < 0) != (q[k].get_flt() < 0))
01034           return p[k].get_flt() < q[k].get_flt();
01035         y = msdb(p[k], q[k]);
01036         if(x < y)
01037           {
01038             j = k;
01039             x = y;
01040           }
01041       }
01042     return p[j] < q[j];
01043   }
01044   CType offset;
01045 };
01046 
01057 template<typename Point>
01058 class zorder_lt
01059 {
01060 public:
01067   zorder_lt()
01068   {
01069     zorder_traits<typename Point::__NumType>::check_type();
01070   }
01074   ~zorder_lt(){;}
01075   
01076   void set_offset(typename Point::__NumType offset)
01077   {
01078     lt.set_offset(offset);
01079   }
01090   bool operator()(const Point &p, const Point &q)
01091   {
01092     return lt(p, q);
01093   }
01105   bool operator()(const Mypair<typename std::vector<Point>::iterator,typename std::vector<long unsigned int>::iterator> &p, const Mypair<typename std::vector<Point>::iterator, typename std::vector<long unsigned int>::iterator> &q)
01106   {
01107     return lt(p.val1, q.val1);
01108   }
01123   double dist_sq_to_quad_box(const Point &q, const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
01124   {
01125     return lt.dist_sq_to_quad_box(q,p1,p2);
01126   }
01141   void dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(const Point &q1, const Point &q2, const Point &p1, const Point &p2, double &dist, double &radius1, double &radius2)
01142   {
01143     lt.dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(q1, q2, p1, p2, dist, radius1, radius2);
01144   }
01152   void min_quad_box(const Point &p1, const Point &p2, Point &lcorner, Point &ucorner)
01153   {
01154     lt.min_quad_box(p1,p2, lcorner, ucorner);
01155   }
01162   double quad_box_length(const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
01163   {
01164     return lt.quad_box_length(p1, p2);
01165   };
01166 private:
01167   zorder_lt_worker<Point, typename Point::__NumType, typename zorder_traits<typename Point::__NumType>::is_signed, typename zorder_traits<typename Point::__NumType>::is_integral, typename zorder_traits<typename Point::__NumType>::is_seperated> lt;
01168 };
